constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 84 (Friday, May 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. AMODEI:
H.R. 3240.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority on which this bill rests is
the power of Congress to provide for the common defense and
general welfare of the United States enumerated in Article I,
Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H2357]
